p: In logistic regression mixed effect models, plant survival models varied across species ( Table 2). Although survival of all three species was predicted by elevation and soil moisture, the relationship was variable for all species ( Table 3). The random effect of plot did not explain variation in highest-ranked models (ICC < 0.001) for D. viscosa and Sophora chrysophylla ( Table 4). However, plot was retained to account for micro-variation between plots in models, and to maintain comparability across species.
